string-array.name: arrLevelThreeDailyActClothesAccSpeechText
string-array.item: I need help putting on clothes

string-array.name: arrLevelThreeDailyActHabitsSpeechText
string-array.item: Please wait at the red light
Please walk only on the green light
Please walk only on the sidewalk
Please watch out for cars on the road
Please look to the left and right before crossing
Please do not talk with food in your mouth
Please put garbage in the bin
Please do not pick your nose
Please do not bite yourself or others
Please do not play with matchsticks
Please do not play with pointed objects
Please do not put your hands in your underpants
Please keep one arm distance while talking to others
Please do not touch others inappropriately
Please do not go out with strangers
